newsitem.title: USA: Saratoga to close acquisition in 10 days.
newsitem.headline: Saratoga to close acquisition in 10 days.

text.p: Saratoga Brands Inc said it now expects to close its $9.8 million stock acquisition of Global Auto Group Inc within the next ten business days.
The company had said when it announced the acquisition on February 6 that the deal would close by March 6.
Global Auto is in the retail auto business, while Saratoga Brands, though its subsidiaries, provides catering services to convenience stores and imports specialty foods.
Saratoga will spin off its catering business, Mobile Caterers Inc, to focus on the retail auto business, Scott Halprin, Saratoga's chief executive, said.
The company said it plans to file with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission within the next five business days the forms related to the spinoff.
Global Auto had revenues of more than $25 million for the fiscal year ended December 31, 1995, according to Saratoga.
